item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a software engineer based out of the Minneapolis/Saint Paul, Minnesota area. I run a small boutique software development shop called Halogen Labs, where I work with startsup & small companies to architect, design, and build web applications and APIs to solve their business problems or build products. My interests include Elixir, Ruby, GIS & geospatial data, and amateur radio.
